trans-unit.source: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.
trans-unit.target: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.

trans-unit.source: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps
trans-unit.target: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps

trans-unit.source: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps
trans-unit.target: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.
trans-unit.target: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.

trans-unit.source: This article explains how you can use Entity Framework 7 with a SQLite database in a Universal Windows app.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how you can use Entity Framework 7 with a SQLite database in a Universal Windows app.

trans-unit.source: Originally for .NET developers, Entity Framework 7 can be used with SQLite on Universal Windows Platform (UWP) to store and manipulate relational data using domain specific objects.
trans-unit.target: Originally for .NET developers, Entity Framework 7 can be used with SQLite on Universal Windows Platform (UWP) to store and manipulate relational data using domain specific objects.

trans-unit.source: You can migrate EF code from a .NET app to a UWP app and expect it work with appropriate changes to the connection string.
trans-unit.target: You can migrate EF code from a .NET app to a UWP app and expect it work with appropriate changes to the connection string.

trans-unit.source: Currently EF only supports SQLite on UWP.
trans-unit.target: Currently EF only supports SQLite on UWP.

trans-unit.source: A detailed walkthrough on installing Entity Framework 7, and creating models is available at the [Getting Started on Universal Windows Platform page](http://ef.readthedocs.org/en/latest/getting-started/uwp.html).
trans-unit.target: A detailed walkthrough on installing Entity Framework 7, and creating models is available at the [Getting Started on Universal Windows Platform page](http://ef.readthedocs.org/en/latest/getting-started/uwp.html).
